import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function PaymentForm(props) { const { cartItems, setCartItems } = props; const [input, setInput] = useState({ fname: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", apartment: "", city: "", zipcode: "", ccv: "", cardNumber: "", payment: "", }); const [nameError, setNameError] = useState(null); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); function handleChange(e) { // Use spread operator to clone previous state, but replace with new values setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); // prevents refresh in all browsers alert(`Payment Submitted ${input.fname} #${input.cardNumber}`); setMessage("Thank you for Shopping. Enjoy your Purchase :)"); setCartItems([]); } return (
